creditline: Gift of Peggy and Leonard Lindborg
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: ginger jar-shaped; three small handles at shoulder; domed cover with rounded knob; cover is plain light blue; vessel decorated with incised floral vines and organic designs, with blue-green and tan glaze
medium: Sawankalok ware Glazed ceramic, brown and white ware
title: Covered jar
